mapper.select: select e.type, ee.img_url imgUrl, ee.durability, ee.common_attack commonAttack, ee.source_force_attack sourceForceAttack, ee.source_force sourceForce, ee.hit_rate hitRate, ee.mobility from equipment e join equipment_expansion ee on e.id = ee.equipment_id join student_equipment se on e.id = se.equipment_id and se.student_id = #{studentId} and se.type = 1 and ee.intensification_degree = se.intensification_degree

select
from equipment where `type` =#{type} order by level

select
from equipment where type =#{type} and level =#{level}

select e.id id, e.name equipmentName,e.grade grade,stuEqu.intensification_degree degree from equipment e join student_equipment stuEqu on e.id=stuEqu.equipment_id where stuEqu.student_id =#{studentId} and e.type=#{type} and stuEqu.type=1
